title: Less-than-or-equal is antisymmetric on naturals
preamble:
Require Import Arith.
Require Import Lia.
lemma_statement: Lemma le_antisym : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> m <= n -> n = m.
skeleton:
Lemma le_antisym : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> m <= n -> n = m.
